nodes.text: Oh! Oh! Why hello there! How are you doing?
Oh! I didn't mean to be too forward, I'm just so excited!
transitions: Do you know anything about this train?

nodes.text: Oh! Oh! Ooooh! I'm on my way to see my husband. You know, men and working away. Same old, same old. Oh ho!
I'm expecting a beautiful young daughter here! Oh ho! This is a dream come true!
transitions: Do you know anything about this train?

nodes.text: Hmmm.... Actually I heard recently that a train crashed somewhere. Oh... I'm a little scared, but I'm sure it'll fine!
